pkgmetadata.longdescription: Change Point Detection // Time series analysis of network connectivity. Detects and visualizes change points between networks. Methods included in the package are discussed in depth in Baek, C., Gates, K. M., Leinwand, B., Pipiras, V. (2021) "Two sample tests for high-dimensional auto- covariances" doi:10.1016/j.csda.2020.107067 and Baek, C., Gampe, M., Leinwand B., Lindquist K., Hopfinger J. and Gates K. (2021) Detecting functional connectivity changes in fMRI data. Preprint.
